name: 吳建文
objective: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Structural Query Langugage, Relational Model and Normalization
Week 3: Database Design and Entity-Relationship Model
Week 4~5: Managing Multiuser Databases
Week 6~9: Managing Databases with MySQL
Week 10~11: Web Server Concepts
Week 12~13: XML
Week 14~16: Database Processing for Business Intelligence Systems
Week 17~18: Project
materials:
David M. Kroenke and David J. Auer
Database Processing: Fundamentals, Design, and Implementation
11th Edition
Pearson
